detail_desc: A pair of metal hoop earrings decorated with plastic beads and lemon-shaped pendants.
Metal earrings in various designs decorated with glass rhinestones. Two pairs are studs. Length from 1 cm to 3 cm.
A pair of earrings in metal with leaf-shaped pendants in metal and lemon-shaped pendants in plastic. Length 6 cm.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a high waist and zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with creases and a short slit at the hems.
Body in soft jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with wide shoulder straps, a lined gusset with concealed press-studs and medium coverage at the back. Lined at the top.
Boots in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a zip at one side. Linings and insoles in satin made from recycled polyester, and chunky soles. Heel 2 cm.
Kangol x H&M. Adjustable belt in a jacquard weave with a plastic snap lock.
Round-necked playsuit in pleated jersey with a sheen. Raglan butterfly sleeves, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and raw edges at the sleeves and hem.

Blouse in a cool cotton weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with a sleeve placket and close-fitting buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Joggers in soft denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, open back pocket and tapered legs.

Patterned swimsuit with a flounced trim at the front that continues along the shoulder straps, and a lined gusset.
Fitted, knee-length dresses in soft, stretch cotton jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.

Straight-cut, calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, chest pockets and a detachable tie belt under the bust. Slits in the sides. Unlined.

Large waist bag in soft imitation leather with a zip at the top and an adjustable fabric waist strap with a carabiner hook at one end. Taffeta lining made from recycled polyester. Depth 5.5 cm. Width 32 cm. Height 17 cm.

Fleece-lined jacket in windproof, water-repellent nylon. Hood with a drawstring at the front, drip-free peak and an elasticated drawstring at the back to allow it to fit comfortably and snugly on the head. High collar, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a yoke front and back. Chest pockets, patch front pockets with a flap and concealed press-studs, and an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Covered elastication at the cuffs, and a concealed, elasticated drawstring at the hem that can be adjusted at the sides.

Short dress in an airy, patterned cotton weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Flounces down the front and back and 3/4-length, puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Recycled polyester lining.

Short dress in an airy, patterned cotton weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Flounces down the front and back and 3/4-length, puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Recycled polyester lining.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a zip down the front. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and a wide, elasticated hem. Medium support. The polyester content of the sports bra is recycled.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. High, bonded waist with a zip at the front. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim with worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge hems.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim with worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge hems.
Top in jersey crêpe with butterfly sleeves, a round neckline and a small opening with a button at the front. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back.

Dungaree shorts in washed cotton denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps, a chest pocket and side and back pockets. Buttons at the sides, a fake fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Short-sleeved, calf-length dress in soft, ribbed jersey with a collar and a V-neck opening at the front. Unlined.

Short dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Square neckline, narrow elastication over the shoulders and a seam under the bust. Long puff sleeves with smocking at the top and cuffs, and an open back with narrow elastication at the waist and wide, horizontal ties. Overlocked edges around the shoulders and cuffs. Lined.
